Articles.Content: I have always wanted to make a carrier, can someone make a mod with a catapult, naval docking ports, a tailhook and arrestor wires that can be placed like space tape (struts)?? Or is there already a mod for that??? Help please

Once Maritime Pack is up and running again, I will try and implement  naval docking ports, a tailhook and arrestor wires since I have had quite a few requests for that.

In the meantime I believe Boat Parts has still has working tailhooks and arrestor wires.
